TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICollection implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable

summary.span: 定义所有非泛型集合的大小、枚举数和同步方法。

span.span: Defines size, enumerators, and synchronization methods for all nongeneric collections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口是中的类的基接口命名空间。The interface is the base interface for classes in the namespace. 接口扩展;和是扩展的专用化程度的接口。The interface extends ; and are more specialized interfaces that extend . 实现是键/值对的集合，如类。An implementation is a collection of key/value pairs, like the class. 实现是值的集合和其成员可按照索引进行访问，如类。An implementation is a collection of values and its members can be accessed by index, like the class. 某些集合访问权限进行限制它们的元素，如类和类，请直接实现接口。Some collections that limit access to their elements, such as the class and the class, directly implement the interface. 如果既没有接口也不接口满足所需的集合的要求，而派生新的集合类从接口改为更大的灵活性。If neither the interface nor the interface meet the requirements of the required collection, derive the new collection class from the interface instead for more flexibility. 此接口的泛型版本，请参阅。For the generic version of this interface, see .

param.name: array

param.name: index
param.span: array 中从零开始的索引，在此处开始复制。

span.span: The zero-based index in array at which copying begins.

summary.span: 从特定的 索引处开始，将 的元素复制到一个 中。

span.span: Copies the elements of the to an , starting at a particular index.

exception.span: 源 中的元素个数大于从 到目标 末尾之间的可用空间。

span.span: The number of elements in the source is greater than the available space from to the end of the destination .

exception.span: 无法自动将源 的类型转换为目标 的类型。

span.span: The type of the source cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean
public: property bool IsSynchronized { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否同步对 的访问（线程安全）。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果对 的访问是同步的（线程安全），则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if access to the is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回一个对象，该对象可用于同步对 的访问。 returns an object, which can be used to synchronize access to the . 中的大多数集合类命名空间还实现提供同步的包装基础集合已同步方法。Most collection classes in the namespace also implement a Synchronized method, which provides a synchronized wrapper around the underlying collection. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 下面的代码示例演示如何锁定集合使用属性在整个枚举期间。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the property during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.ICollection#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.icollection/cpp/remarks.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.ICollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.icollection/cs/remarks.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.ICollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.icollection/vb/remarks.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object
public: property System::Object ^ SyncRoot { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取可用于同步对 的访问的对象。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

value.span: 可用于同步对 的访问的对象。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于其基础存储区不公用的集合，预期的实现是返回当前实例。For collections whose underlying store is not publicly available, the expected implementation is to return the current instance. 请注意，指向当前实例的指针可能还不够对于包装了其他集合; 的集合这些集合应返回基础集合`SyncRoot`属性。Note that the pointer to the current instance might not be sufficient for collections that wrap other collections; those should return the underlying collection's `SyncRoot` property. 命名空间中的大多数集合类也实现 `Synchronized` 方法，该方法对基础集合提供同步的包装。Most collection classes in the namespace also implement a `Synchronized` method, which provides a synchronized wrapper around the underlying collection. 不过，派生类可使用 属性来提供各自的同步版本的集合。However, derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the collection using the property. 同步代码必须对集合的 属性执行操作，而不是直接对集合执行操作。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the property of the collection, not directly on the collection. 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具体地说，这样可与可能同时对集合实例进行修改的其他线程保持正确的同步。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the collection instance. 在缺少`Synchronized`方法对集合，预期使用情况将如下所示：In the absence of a `Synchronized` method on a collection, the expected usage for looks as follows: [!code-cpp[System.Collections.ICollection#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.icollection/cpp/remarks.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.ICollection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.icollection/cs/remarks.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.ICollection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.icollection/vb/remarks.vb#2)] 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 下面的代码示例演示如何锁定集合使用属性在整个枚举期间。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the property during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.ICollection#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.icollection/cpp/remarks.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.ICollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.icollection/cs/remarks.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.ICollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.icollection/vb/remarks.vb#1)]
